column4: is there some place I can look to find out what the plans are for posting an update firefox and thunderbird package for ubuntu?
updates occur at new releases, or for security fixes

I understand that, there's a security release available for FF & TB (came out last week).  I was just wondering (and I'm suprised) that ubuntu hasn't created a package for it.  thought there might be a blog or post about it.
not that I am aware of
